title: Weekend Review, VMA's, Chicken Sandwich War, Sand and Soul and more.
itunes:title: Weekend Review, VMA's, Chicken Sandwich War, Sand and Soul and more.
description:
Good morning, rejoice and be glad.  Welcome to the ride!  Steve talks about his amazing weekend at the Okavango Delta.  Inside Church Complaints, The Back That Thang Up Ministry may have some concerns.  Last night was the season premiere of Power and Newark, NJ is where the VMA's will take place and Missy Elliot will be honored.  J. Anthony Brown needs a wife because his house is a problem.  Uncle Steve gives us his Top 50 list of greatest R&B singers.  The chicken sandwich war of the century between Popeyes and Chick-fil-A has got people talking.  Sand and Soul this year will be the baddest.  Andrew Luck of the Indianapolis Colts retires.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about getting past the lesson to the blessing and so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
